Uses of Package
entity

Packages that use entity
Package
Description
boundary
 
controller
 
entity
 
global
 
  • Classes in entity used by boundary
    Class
    Description
    Cineplex
    A Cineplex which consists of at least 3 or more Cinemas with attributes of Cineplex Code, Cineplex Name, Cineplex located mall, Cineplex's address, Cineplex's distinct mall location e.g Level 5 West Mall Cineplex's nearest MRT station, and a list of Cinemas belonging in this Cineplex
    Movie
    A Movie that is shown in the Cinemas, A movie can be in many Cinemas
    Seat
    A Seat that belongs to a Seating Layout.
    Ticket
    A Ticket that a belongs to a Transaction Can be booked by MovieGoer that corresponds to the Seat ID in the CinemaShowTime
    User
    A base class for Admin or MovieGoer It consists of the username and password and similar attributes
  • Classes in entity used by controller
    Class
    Description
    Admin
    An Admin or Cinema Staff which has access to the system Have the rights to Create/Update/Delete movie listing, showtimes or configure system settings
    Cast
    A Cast represents the actor/actress which belongs to a Movie a cast contains an integer ID, it's name and the corresponding Movie it belongs to.
    Cinema
    A Cinema which belongs to a Cineplex.
    CinemaClass
    Enum CinemaClass to represent the class of Cinema
    CinemaShowTime
    A CinemaShowTime belongs to a Cinema with attributes of Cinema Code, Hall number, Cineplex, CinemaClass to represent the Class(Standard/Platinum), Showtimes of this cinema, which may have many showtimes in this cinema and SeatingLayout (The static representaion in text file)
    Cineplex
    A Cineplex which consists of at least 3 or more Cinemas with attributes of Cineplex Code, Cineplex Name, Cineplex located mall, Cineplex's address, Cineplex's distinct mall location e.g Level 5 West Mall Cineplex's nearest MRT station, and a list of Cinemas belonging in this Cineplex
    Movie
    A Movie that is shown in the Cinemas, A movie can be in many Cinemas
    MovieGoer
    A MovieGoer who utilized the system to View Movies/Cineplex/Cinemas or Booking a ticket for a Movie Usually has restricted access, a guest must register as a MovieGoer to be able to book a ticket.
    MovieType
    Enum MovieShowingStatus to represent the Type of the Movie 2D is the standard while 3D is the elevated experience and more expensive
    Review
    A Review that represents the MovieGoer's description about his experience of the movie.
    SeatingLayout
    A Seating Layout that shows the Seats of the Cinema A moviegoer will be shown this layout while booking for a Movie of a specific CinemaShowTime
    Ticket
    A Ticket that a belongs to a Transaction Can be booked by MovieGoer that corresponds to the Seat ID in the CinemaShowTime
    TicketDay
    Enum TicketDay to represent the movie day of the Ticket which is used to add charges if it's weekend
    TicketType
    Enum TicketType to represent the type of the Ticket which differentiate the age group of the movie goer
    Transaction
     
  • Classes in entity used by entity
    Class
    Description
    Cast
    A Cast represents the actor/actress which belongs to a Movie a cast contains an integer ID, it's name and the corresponding Movie it belongs to.
    Cinema
    A Cinema which belongs to a Cineplex.
    CinemaClass
    Enum CinemaClass to represent the class of Cinema
    CinemaShowTime
    A CinemaShowTime belongs to a Cinema with attributes of Cinema Code, Hall number, Cineplex, CinemaClass to represent the Class(Standard/Platinum), Showtimes of this cinema, which may have many showtimes in this cinema and SeatingLayout (The static representaion in text file)
    MovieClassifiedRating
    Enum MovieClassifiedRating to represent the Film Rating of the movie which restricts the age regarding the maturity of content
    MovieShowingStatus
    Enum MovieShowingStatus to represent the status of the Movie End of Show means that MovieGoer won't be able to view or book that movie
    MovieType
    Enum MovieShowingStatus to represent the Type of the Movie 2D is the standard while 3D is the elevated experience and more expensive
    Review
    A Review that represents the MovieGoer's description about his experience of the movie.
    Seat
    A Seat that belongs to a Seating Layout.
    SeatingLayout
    A Seating Layout that shows the Seats of the Cinema A moviegoer will be shown this layout while booking for a Movie of a specific CinemaShowTime
    Ticket
    A Ticket that a belongs to a Transaction Can be booked by MovieGoer that corresponds to the Seat ID in the CinemaShowTime
    TicketDay
    Enum TicketDay to represent the movie day of the Ticket which is used to add charges if it's weekend
    TicketType
    Enum TicketType to represent the type of the Ticket which differentiate the age group of the movie goer
    User
    A base class for Admin or MovieGoer It consists of the username and password and similar attributes
  • Classes in entity used by global
    Class
    Description
    Admin
    An Admin or Cinema Staff which has access to the system Have the rights to Create/Update/Delete movie listing, showtimes or configure system settings
    MovieGoer
    A MovieGoer who utilized the system to View Movies/Cineplex/Cinemas or Booking a ticket for a Movie Usually has restricted access, a guest must register as a MovieGoer to be able to book a ticket.
